triples.name: Consensus dynamics
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a new predefined-time consensus protocol for multi-agent systems.

triples.name: Robust control
triples.relevance: The paper employs prescribed performance control scheme which builds on robust control theory.

triples.name: Fault tolerance
triples.relevance: The paper proposes an adaptive compensation mechanism to improve fault tolerance in UAV systems.

triples.name: Barrier function
triples.relevance: The paper introduces an output-dependent universal barrier function to enforce attitude constraints.

triples.name: Unmanned aerial vehicle
triples.relevance: Multi-UAV systems are the application domain for the proposed control schemes.

triples.name: Euler angles
triples.relevance: The paper addresses limitations of Euler angle representations in attitude control by removing restrictive assumptions.
